title: (x) Getty Images logo - Trade Gothic (customized) {Jan E}
content:
Hi all,

Can anyone tell me what font was used for the getty images logo:

[http://www.gettyimages.com/Images/GlobalNav/logo-Getty-black.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417002411/http:/www.gettyimages.com/Images/GlobalNav/logo-Getty-black.gif "http://www.gettyimages.com/Images/GlobalNav/logo-Getty-black.gif")

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content: Next time when you know what you're looking for maybe do a [Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417002411/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20getty%20images%20logo) first. You would've found [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417002411/http:/typophile.com/node/1554). ;^)
